column4: Can someone help me get all 4 speakers running on ubuntu? I'm running a dell dimension desktop with an Intel IHC5 card.
Only two work as of right now.
I've asked this question before, all I get is 'play with Alsa'. I've played with alsa until the cows come home, to no avail...
right click on the volume control in the panel, select 'open volume control', go to teh 'switches' tab, and click 'duplicate front'
If the tab/the option isn't there, go to edit/preferences and add it.
all I see is "headphone jack sensetive"
There's also a 'channel mode' option that lets you select the number of channels.
I don't know what that means, sorry.
number of channels as in stereo, 2.1, 5.1, and so on
now I uncheck exchange front and surround and I get sound, but only out of the two speakers
